text: Tanzhou is a town situated at the southern extremity of the prefecture-level city of Zhongshan, Guangdong province. The population of Tanzhou has residents. The total area of the town is . Tanzhou is within northwest of the border with Macau and borders Zhuhai to the south and east; it is thus much closer to central Zhuhai than central Zhongshan. ==See also== *Shatian dialect ==External links== *Tanzhou Government Website Category:Zhongshan Category:Township-level divisions of Guangdong
title: Tanzhou Town
